@magic-themes

magic themes are themes for magic apps. you decide which theme to load by specifying the theme name in config.THEME

// /config.jsmodule.exports = {  // ...rest of config,  THEME: 'blue',}

theme load order

themes get loaded from multiple places. last in the list overwrites earlier entries.

/node_modules/@magic/core/src/themes/${config.THEME}/index.js

/node_modules/@magic-themes/${config.THEME}

/assets/themes/${config.THEME}/index.js
